title: S&P 500 Sees Best FOMC Day Since March as Powell Praises Economy
description: US equities rallied Wednesday afternoon after the Federal Reserve delivered a widely anticipated quarter-point interest-rate cut and Chair Jerome Powell touted the resilience of the US economy while assuaging concerns around the inflationary impact of tariffs.
content: US equities rallied Wednesday afternoon after the Federal Reserve delivered a widely anticipated quarter-point interest-rate cut and Chair Jerome Powell touted the resilience of the US economy while assuaging concerns around the inflationary impact of tariffs.
